/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, each with its own unique architectural style. On the left, a tall apartment building stands out, its facade adorned with balconies that overlook the street. On the right, a red brick building adds a touch of traditional charm to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the cityscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban environment. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings.
